header.subtitle: Consistently rated as excellent by 265-40r22 drivers
Check out the sale price on this tire

content.body:
### Shop 265/40R22 Tire Size
265/40R22 tires are commonly found on passenger cars, SUVs, CUVs, and light trucks like the Ford Edge Sport, Genesis GV80, Jaguar F-Pace, Land Rover Range Rover Velar, and Lincoln MKX. These cars often need 265/40R22 tires to perform optimally, and might’ve rolled out of the factory with a set of Pirelli Scorpion Asimmetrico,[Pirelli Scorpion Zero All Season]( https://simpletire.com/brands/pirelli-tires/scorpion-zero-all-season), Michelin Primacy Tour A/S, Pirelli P Zero, or Continental Cross Contact LX Sport tires attached.

Popular vehicles: 
2009-2014 Ford Edge Sport
2021 Genesis GV80
2017-2021 Jaguar F-Pace
2018-2021 Land Rover Range Rover Velar
2010-2015 Lincoln MKX

All-season tires provide year-round traction and are good for drivers who only want to use one set of tires to ditch that tire swapping during summers and winters. Consider the Pirelli Scorpion Zero All Season Plus, General G-MAX AS-05, and Continental ExtremeContact DWS06 PLUS [Continental ExtremeContact DWS06 PLUS](https://simpletire.com/brands/continental-tires/extremecontact-dws06-plus) if you need a set of 265/40R22 tires that performs in dry, wet, and light winter weather conditions.

Performance tires offer drivers of sports cars and other vehicles increased handling response and traction, especially in wet and dry conditions. Check out the Hankook Ventus ST (RH06), Federal Couragia F/X, and Yokohama Parada Spec-X[Yokohama Parada Spec-X](https://simpletire.com/brands/yokohama-tires/parada-spec-x) if you need a set of 265/40R22 performance tires.

Ultra-high-performance (UHP) tires are ideal for sports and supercars, as they offer sporty traction and handling even while driving at higher speeds. Take a look at the Kumho Ecsta STX KL12 and [Michelin Pilot Sport All Season 4](https://simpletire.com/brands/michelin-tires/pilot-sport-all-season-4) if you need a set of 265/40R22 tires. Make sure that you replace ultra-high-performance tires with winter or all-season tires once temperatures are consistently below 45 degrees Fahrenheit.

Summer tires offer optimum performance in summer conditions and regions with warmer climates. Be sure to swap the summer tires with winter or all-season tires during the winter season. Have a look at the Michelin Pilot Sport 4S, [Pirelli P Zero](https://simpletire.com/brands/pirelli-tires/p-zero), and Hankook Ventus S1 evo3 (K127E) if you need a set of 265/40R22 tires for commendable drives during the summers.

Whether you drive a Ford Edge Sport, Genesis GV80, Jaguar F-Pace, or something else, SimpleTire has a set of 265/40R22 tires that meet your needs at a greater price!

info.title: Did you know?
info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
